client

Class ClientInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientConsole
      • client.ClientInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChatIF

    public class ClientInterface
extends ClientConsole
    The main program class. Contains the main function and creates the first log-in frame. Extends ClientConsole.

        public void logOut()
        This method is called when user logs out or when program terminates. It sends a "LogOut" request to server.
